segments.text: I've got a headache and sore throat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you had it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It all started the day before yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you've got the flu . There's a lot of it about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take some medicine and stay in bed for a day or two .
segments.speaker: S2
